Name: P R I S M - A Visual Novel
About the game: P R I S M (or PRISM ) is a Visual Novel game set in a fantasy world where dragons, elves, and magic is the norm. Freyja is a young traveler making her way to The Palace of the Grey: a place called the city of opportunity by many. On her journey, she becomes stuck in the town called Avon-On-Reach when a sudden fog descends upon the town. As she gets to know the residence, she soon starts to wonder if there's more to the fog than meets the eye, and if it has a connection to the strange happenings around the town. Game made with Ren'py 8.1k word count (demo) 25k word count (full game) About 30 minutes of gameplay (demo) About 2 hours of gameplay (full game) 3 different endings Hand-drawn backgrounds and character sprites Story, Artwork and Backgrounds - GoldieClaws Martha and Michelangelo's designs - Flyteck Music - Kevin Macload Additional Sound Effects - freesound
